title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson pack on the PDA on Halloween-themed date night
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

New couple Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson could not keep their hands off each other as they enjoyed a date night at Universal Studios Hollywood’s Halloween Horror Night.

Miley, 26, looked delighted to see her beau on their first date night since 22-year-old Cody returned to the US from his native Australia.

The couple were seen grinning broadly as they headed into the theme park with their arms around each other.

Dressed in baggy jeans, black t-shirt and baseball cap, Cody appeared fresh faced and in high spirits despite his long-haul flight from Sydney.

(Image: Juliano-roll/X17online.com)

(Image: Juliano-roll/X17online.com)

Miley looked equally casual in skinny black jeans, a black sleeveless top and a matching newsboy hat.

The loved up couple packed on the PDA as they took in attractions like The Walking Dead walk-through maze on a pre-Halloween date night.

Their reunion comes just days after they were criticised by Lindsay Lohan, who made a savage dig at Cody on her Instagram in a now-deleted post.

Her issue with Cody appears to stem from his short-lived fling with her younger sister Aliana following his split from model Gigi Hadid.

(Image: Juliano-roll/X17online.com)

(Image: Juliano-roll/X17online.com)

Lindsay posted a snap of Cody and her 25-year-old sibling, suggesting he had "settled for less" with Miley and claiming he had "lost his fortune".

She wrote: "When you realise you failed. And you settle for less @codysimpson.

"Family is everything you won the masked singer but you lost your future."

Cody and Miley confirmed their romance on October 4, just two months after she split from husband Liam Hemsworth.

Their blossoming romance followed years of platonic friendship after they first met in 2014.

description: The singer looked delighted to spend time with her Australian boyfriend at a theme park in Hollywood
